body: It seems that **HVAC Availability Schedule** is not shown on the **Honeybee_Get EP Schedules** component. However, it is one of the inputs for the **Honeybee_Set EP Zone Schedules** component. I want to know the **on/off schedule of the Ideal Loads Air System** specified for those default zone programs. Can anybody kindly advise? Thank you! [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/BKb27P3JwiHWYt7pLGqGJkjNXfUCviVwtWxUzwvFwxXnLY6utLx2gmFb1cAwrulvv8y*6x*d3FWl7mKFNHzHCXL2X2CxP3a3/04.JPG)[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/BKb27P3JwiGFwleV*zWs9wsOddnl76zuvGmMoJITpeZfegZBSccOK2nw2C0TsczZpOOqerHAu6afmJEkIF72c8yFxam66NMY/05.JPG)
topic: how to check the HVAC Availability Schedule of a zone program
